event.title: Fellowship Jabber meeting about FSFEâ€™s education activities

body.p: FSFE's edu-team will organize a jabber meeting on Wednesday 18th of November to prioritize the activities to come and discuss the recent developpment in the field of Free Software in education. From 8 p.m. to 9 p.m., you are warmly invited to participate in the fellowship-jabber meeting to join the discussion on the future of the education activity. What is your opinion on Free Software and education? Got any ideas? You can easily find details on how to join the chat on the wiki.
